Control Name: Communicates With the Board of Directors—Relevant information resulting from assessments conducted by external parties is communicated to the board of directors.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates With the Board of Directors—Relevant information resulting from assessments conducted by external parties is communicated to the board of directors.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.3 COSO Principle 15: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control.
